description:
Aries no Shion is the Aries Gold Saint in Lost Canvas and the original Grand Pope of Sanctuary in the original series. He is calm, tranquil and logical. He is a friend of Libra Douko to whom he is often seen talking. He is a descendant of the people from the Lost Continent and is a student of Altar Hakurei, and by implication trained with Crane Yuzuriha.
He also served as the master of Aries Muu, who would eventually inherit the Gold Cloth of Aries from him.
name: Aries no Shion
